name: superbly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely good or impressive: The orchestra played superbly. The military was superbly equipped, trained, and prepared.
More examplesFewer examplesThey have performed superbly, and he expects they'll continue to do so. The show is superbly cast. This is sturdy and vigorous and superbly good value.Jowitt has made superbly resourceful use of Robbins's papers. The duck breast, on the other hand, was superbly rich and juicy.
